feed.title: Monochrome | A minimal, responsive Jekyll blog theme

entry.title: TheReviewIndex | Unbiased User Review Summaries | Monochrome
entry.content: The internet is a source of a humongous amount of unstructured content for all sorts of products, in the form of blogs, videos, user and expert reviews, etc. It is almost impossible for anyone to scour all of this disparate data, with contradictory opinions, and thereafter make a correct, or...

entry.title: Code Example
